location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Sheet No. 1 Canal and Communication Map of Mesopotamia’

mods.abstract: The map shows:existing canals and river systems, marked with blue lines;new canals, or the extensions to existing canals, marked with dashed blue lines;the direction of flow of rivers, indicated by small black arrows;district boundaries, marked with thick red dashed lines, and the names of each district printed in large black capitals;roads, marked by thin red lines;human settlements, marked with red dots and black place names;railways, marked by crossed black lines.
